title: No patch today?
body:
Are you having a laugh, Riot? Only champ I've been excited for in a while without binging on PBE videos because I don't want to spoil it and now you won't patch.

Assuming she comes out next week, there'll still be a week delay before she's activated. Two weeks. In before my own hype for her dies and I just don't bother.

Let me play Xayah! :c

replies.body: They patched last week, you need to wait for the normal patch date on the 18/19th.
